original_text: When Josiah had been king for 18 years, he sent Shaphan to the Lord's temple. Shaphan was the son of Azaliah, and the grandson of Meshullam. He was the king's secretary. Josiah told Shaphan,
korean_text: 요시야 왕 열여덟째 해에 왕이 므술람의 손자 아살리야의 아들 서기관 사반을 여호와의 성전에 보내며 이르되

sentences.original_text: When Josiah had been king for 18 years
sentences.korean_translation: 요시야가 왕이 된 지 18년이 되었을 때

sentences.original_text: he sent Shaphan to the Lord's temple
Shaphan was the son of Azaliah
